items.title: McDonald's (MCD) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider
items.description: In the most recent trading session, McDonald's (MCD) closed at $306.92, indicating a +1.09% shift from the previous trading day.

items.title: Yum China Plans Ambitious Expansion, Pledges $3 Bil To Investors
items.description: Yum China plans to add 1,800 stores this year. Up to 80% will be KFC or Pizza Hut chains. The restaurateur plans a $3 billion buyback.
